entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 6:32 PM MDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
